attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Free the Chicken People! Long have this minority been opressed by those who would seek to take advantage of these poor folk. Enough is enough I say. From this day forth they shall hold their beaks high. I ask, nay beg the U.K. government to send in a crack squad of S.A.S. to free the Homo Gallus Sapiens from the tyranny of the one known as Colonel S.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
